pre_rescue.text: Help! I'm trapped under this rubble!
My leg's stuck... please help me move the debris.

post_rescue.text: I couldn't have made it without your help.

level_2_briefing.text: A 6.8 magnitude earthquake has been recorded offshore.
Initial tremors have already been felt across the barangay.
Structural damage is likely. Aftershocks are expected.
[b]Residential Zone A[/b] has high-density housing and weak concrete structures.
The elementary school is currently occupied.
Expect civilian panic and possible gas leaks.
Guide at least 3 civilians to the designated safe assembly zone.
Identify and secure at least one structural hazard.
Provide first aid to injured civilians if necessary.
You have limited time before secondary tremors escalate.

debriefing.text: Your actions helped minimize casualties and restore order.
Aftershocks remain possible. Continue to monitor structural stability.
Return to base for evaluation and further instructions.

sandbox_welcome.text: You are now in the training sandbox environment.
This space is designed for practice, experimentation, and mastery.
There is no time limit here. No penalties. No mission failure.
Each chamber contains a specific objective scenario from our disaster response operations.
You may enter any chamber at any time.
Inside, focus on completing the objective as instructed.
Observe your environment carefully. Use the correct tools. Apply proper procedure.
If you wish to attempt the scenario again, locate the reset button on the chamber wall.
Pressing the reset button will restore the chamber to its initial state.
You may repeat each objective as many times as necessary.
Use this opportunity to refine your technique and improve your response time.
When you feel confident, proceed to the full mission scenarios.
Training builds readiness. Readiness saves lives.
You may begin whenever you are ready.

sandbox_repeat.text: This is the training sandbox environment.
You are free to enter any chamber and practice its objective.
There are no time limits or penalties here.
Focus on proper procedure and situational awareness.
If you want to retry a scenario, use the reset button inside the chamber.
You may repeat each objective as many times as needed.
Continue training until your actions become instinctive.
